goals__remit: MN’s core activities are pension administration, insurance administration, management support and asset management. Our products and services allow our clients’ pension members to accumulate and retain a healthy financial position. We put to work the contributions they are required by law to pay, so they have every right to expect honesty and transparency. That is why value creation and continuity take precedence over profit maximisation.
